original_text: If a man is older than 60 years, they must give 15 pieces of silver. For a woman, they must give ten pieces of silver.
korean_text: 예순 살 이상은 남자면 그 값을 십오 세겔로 하고 여자는 열 세겔로 하라

sentences.original_text: If a man is older than 60 years
they must give 15 pieces of silver
they must give ten pieces of silver
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 은 열 조각을 바쳐야 한다
